thread.title: Mystery as Ku Klux Klan ‘Imperial Wizard’ is found dead from gunshot wound ‘in act of violence’ after ‘telling his wife he was filing for divorce’
thread.title_full: Mystery as Ku Klux Klan ‘Imperial Wizard’ is found dead from gunshot wound ‘in act of violence’ after ‘telling his wife he was filing for divorce’

author: mhodge
title: Mystery as Ku Klux Klan ‘Imperial Wizard’ is found dead from gunshot wound ‘in act of violence’ after ‘telling his wife he was filing for divorce’
text:
Opinion KKK LEADER DEAD Mystery as Ku Klux Klan ‘Imperial Wizard’ is found dead from gunshot wound ‘in act of violence’ after ‘telling his wife he was filing for divorce’ 
The body of Frank Ancona, 51, was found by a family on fishing trip in Missouri By MARK HODGE
